title: The Binary, the Structure of Reality and the intersection with Neuroscience,
description:
We discuss:

Looking, still looking, continuing to look... and how that changes our perception of reality.

Iain McGilchrist, The Master and His Emissary
Jordan Peterson, Maps of Meaning and 12 Rules for Life
Esther Lightcap Meek, Longing to Know, Loving to Know
David Bentley Hart
The Portal podcast with Eric Weinstein and Roger Penrose
